vlive.korean: 마주 볼까요? Shall we sit facing each other? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TXT (투모로우바이투게더) ‘TALK X TODAY : Season2 ’ EP.2
vlive.english: Shall we sit facing each other?

vlive.korean: 마주 보고 감정을... Look at each other and say... 듣기 View video NU'EST : [FULL] NU'EST 일곱 번째 미니앨범 'The Table' 발매 기념 쇼케이스
vlive.english: Look at each other and say...

vlive.korean: [민석과 마주할 사람은 누구일까?] [Who will see him?] View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 결국엔 찾아온 마지막 선택의 순간ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP20
[마주 봐야 하는 순간!] [The moment you have to face each other!] View video OSEN : WINNER 위너, 안대 끼고 'SOSO' 댄스 챌린지 #스타로드 03
vlive.english: [The moment you have to face each other!]

vlive.korean: [두 손 꼬옥 마주 잡고 마무리] 땡! [Completing the mission holding hands together] Done! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 남녀가 스킨십을 하면 어떻게 달라질까?ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP8
vlive.english: [Completing the mission holding hands together] Done!

examples.korean: She smiled at him and he smiled back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그를 보고 웃자 그도 마주 보고 웃어 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She smiled at him and he smiled back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He strayed into the path of an oncoming car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 길을 벗어나 마주 달려오는 자동차의 진로로 들어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He strayed into the path of an oncoming car. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The two opposing armies faced each other across the battlefield. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대치 중인 두 군대가 싸움터를 사이에 두고 서로 마주했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The two opposing armies faced each other across the battlefield. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She turned and faced him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 돌아서서 그를 마주보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She turned and faced him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I stiffened my back and faced him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 등을 뻣뻣이 펴고 그를 마주보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I stiffened my back and faced him. Add to Wordbook
